枕.definition: (bound form) pillow; to rest one's head on (Taiwan pr. [zhen4])

枕冷衾寒.definition: cold pillow and lonely bed (idiom); fig. cold and solitary existence

枕塊.definition: to use clay for a pillow (during mourning period)

枕岩漱流.definition: see 枕石漱流[zhen3 shi2 shu4 liu2]

枕席.definition: pillow mat; pillow and mat; bed

枕席兒.definition: erhua variant of 枕席[zhen3 xi2]

枕心.definition: bare pillow (i.e. the pillow without pillow-case)

枕戈寢甲.definition: lit. to sleep on one's armor with a spear as a pillow (idiom); fig. to keep ready for battle at all times

枕戈待旦.definition: lit. to wait for dawn, one's head resting on a spear (idiom); fig. fully prepared and biding one's time before the battle

枕石漱流.definition: to live a hermit's life (in seclusion); a frugal life (idiom)

枕藉.definition: to lie in total disorder; lying fallen over one another

枕邊人.definition: the person who shares one's bed; partner; spouse

枕頭箱.definition: Chinese pillow box (used to keep valuables)
